take_Average module¶

take_Average.average(mat, mins)[source]¶

gets the length in items in an array of each interval of the time that is inputed in minutes :param mat: (ndarray) :param mins: (int) :returns: list of same length as instantaneous hr that gives average HR at each time point

take_Average.get_interval(mat, mins)[source]¶

gets the length in items in an array of each interval of the time that is inputed in minutes :param mat: (ndarray) :param mins: (int) :returns: length of the interval in float
